availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Brookover (Huntington, Brown County, Ohio farmer. )

body.p: Huntington, Brown County, Ohio farmer. Ohio, native. Son of Asceal Brookover and Margaret Brookover. Married to Isabell Brookover. Father of John Brookover, Mary J. Brookover, Andelea Brookover, George W. Brookover. Farmer in Brown County, Ohio in 1850. Farmer in Brown County, Ohio in 1860. Farmer in Brown County, Ohio in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, District No. 12, Huntington Township, p. 100B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Huntington Township, p. 291.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Huntington Township, p. 113B.
Find A Grave, "Richard Brookover (1802-1872)," Memorial #150441499, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/150441499 (June 6, 2019).
